patient_details.recent_exposure: Recently attended a large indoor conference

doctor_question: How long have you been feeling unwell?
patient_response: Patient: "Honestly, I've been feeling a bit off since I got back from that large conference I attended last week. I think it was the second or third day after I got back that I started feeling tired and my throat started to feel scratchy. At first, I just thought I was experiencing some post-conference fatigue, but it's been lingering and getting worse. The last two days have been especially bad - I've had a nagging cough and my chest feels heavy, like I've been running uphill all day."
